snippet.title: I built my first crafting game in Godot engine! | cave devlog #1
snippet.description:
Welcome to my first ever dev log! I'll show you the game I've been working over the past few weeks. I hope you'll enjoy it. Feel free to give a thumbs up or leave a comment below!


👉 Join my Discord now! https://discord.gg/sJjsksEwDq

⌚ Timestamps

0:00 Introduction
0:45 Games built in Java
2:19 My new game idea
3:36 Reworking the character
4:26 The mining mechanic
6:15 The item system
8:46 Building the inventory UI
9:49 Outro
10:54 Special gameplay

🎮 play cave now for FREE: https://bitbrain.itch.io/cave
🐤 follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/bitbrain_
📝 my blog: https://bitbrain.github.io

 #gamedev #devlog #godot #pixelart #gamedevelopment #cave #gamedevlog #bitbrain 

Music Credits

🎧 'Yoghurt' by xyce https://xyce.bandcamp.com
🎧 'Blue Boi' and other tracks by LAKEY INSPIRED https://soundcloud.com/lakeyinspired/blue-boi
🎧 'MAZE' by Density & Time https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HTT9l4xtWrA
🎧 'Power Up' by Jeremy Blake https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mrgVpZhjOWk
